name: Goblet Of Deliverance
description:
P1 Controls: WASD, Tab to toss, space to attack

P2 Controls: Arrow keys, slash to toss, ctrl to attack

The Goblet Of Deliverance is legendarily powerful, legendarily fragile, and legendarily unwieldy. Since it takes a lot of focus to balance it on your head like that, you can't swing your sword accurately with it on you! Keep it away from the hordes of monsters for as long as you can, and be careful not to drop it. Goblet can take 3 hits while you can take 5.

Created in a little over a week for my first ever game jam, Lone Rabbit's Multiplayer Jam 2022!

Made in Godot 3.5. Uses this asset pack by pixel_poem. Slash effect handmade in Pixel Fx Designer.

Code - johnnymcmike

Music, game ideas, writing, and generally a great help - Wheelsgr
